pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:5.1: 55. The training rule on being stingy with families
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.2: At that time, while walking for almsfood along a street in Sāvatthī, a nun approached a certain family, where she sat down on a prepared seat.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.4: The people there gave her a meal and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.7: “What can be done so that other nuns don’t come?” And she went up to other nuns and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.8: “Venerables, in such-and-such a place there are wild dogs, a temperamental ox, and it’s muddy.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.10: Another nun too approached that family while walking for almsfood along that street. She sat down on a prepared seat
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.12: and the people there gave her a meal. They then asked her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.13: “Venerable, why don’t the nuns come here?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.1: And she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.3: “How can a nun be stingy with families?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that a nun acted like that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.7: How can a nun be stingy with families?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:8.1: ‘If a nun is stingy with families, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:10.2: there are four kinds of families: aristocratic families, brahmin families, merchant families, worker families.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:11.2: if she thinks, “What can be done so that nuns don’t come?”, and she then speaks disparagingly of the family in the presence of nuns, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:11.3: If she speaks disparagingly of nuns in the presence of the family, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:12.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:13.1: The fifth training rule is finished.
